SETS.query: Set of 3 product types (I, II, III), 2 processing stages (A, B), 2 equipment types for stage A (A1, A2), and 3 equipment types for stage B (B1, B2, B3)

VARIABLES.name: x_ip
VARIABLES.LaTeX: x_{i,p} \in \{0, 1\},  orall i \in P, p \in S
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable indicating whether product i is processed in stage p

PARAMETERS.name: raw_material_cost_I
PARAMETERS.description: Raw material cost for product I

PARAMETERS.name: raw_material_cost_II
PARAMETERS.description: Raw material cost for product II

PARAMETERS.name: raw_material_cost_III
PARAMETERS.description: Raw material cost for product III

PARAMETERS.name: fixed_cost_A1
PARAMETERS.description: Fixed cost for equipment A1 at full capacity

PARAMETERS.name: fixed_cost_A2
PARAMETERS.description: Fixed cost for equipment A2 at full capacity

PARAMETERS.name: fixed_cost_B1
PARAMETERS.description: Fixed cost for equipment B1 at full capacity

PARAMETERS.name: fixed_cost_B2
PARAMETERS.description: Fixed cost for equipment B2 at full capacity

PARAMETERS.name: total_production_I_limit
PARAMETERS.description: Total production limit for product I

PARAMETERS.name: total_production_I_and_III_limit
PARAMETERS.description: Total production limit for product I and III

PARAMETERS.name: total_production_II_limit
PARAMETERS.description: Total production limit for product II

PARAMETERS.name: total_production_I_II_III_limit
PARAMETERS.description: Total production limit for product I, II, and III

OBJECTIVE.LaTeX: \max \sum_{i \in P} \sum_{p \in S} (unit\_price_{i} \cdot x_{i,p}) - \sum_{i \in P} \sum_{p \in S} (fixed\_cost_{p} \cdot x_{i,p})
